column6: Trimming bus of internal regulator voltage
Trimming bus of internal bandgap voltage

Frequency Select
000: 12M
001: 16M 
010: 20M 
011: 24M
100: 28M(PLL會針對RCM[2]=1&補償開關開啟=> 補償高速SE)
101: 32M(PLL會針對RCM[2]=1&補償開關開啟=> 補償高速SE)
others: 32M

Internal regulator output enable
0: HIRC Clock out, VDIRCO out HiZ
1: HIRC Clock off, VDIRCO out 1.3V

切換clock要等待16T再放出去
TESTV 要多做一道鎖

column6:
Standby Pin
0: Power On
1: IDLE=H, IP is Power Save  (PASSWORD)
column8:
切換Mode要等10us
切換Mode和切換電壓不能同時做

column6:
Regulator Output Voltage Select Bits.
00: 2.05V(0.95V up)
01: 2.15V(0.95V)
10: 1.80V(0.95V down)
11: 1.95V(0.9v)

LDO Enable Pin, if EN_REG=H, IP is Enable.
0: Disable
1: Enable
column8:
Cload=2.2uF情況下，
供應電壓VDD33由0V升至3.3V，
負載電流=50mA，
輸出電壓VDD2V的start time約需要200us左右

column6:
LDO Power Down Pin, if PD_REG=H, IP is Power Down except Bandgap.
0: Power On
1: Power Down

LDO Standy Pin, if IDLE=H, IC is Power Save.
0: Power On (120us左右 stable)
1: IDLE=H, IP is Power Save

Output Select Pin
0: Internal Regulator Output
1: LDO1 Output
column8:
Default PLLRegu 沒power可能會漏電
預設為LDO1 Power

column6:
Power Pin
0: Power On
1: IDLE=H, IP is Power Down
column8:
先切換VP_SEL
等5us後再開啟Power

column6: Change mode counter for status to status (32Khz)
column8:
預設為0轉換125us左右
預設為3轉換500us左右

要先enable才可以使用
TKFPS32F967:先解除flash lve[5]再設定lve[4]
EM32F967:flash lve[5]和lve[4] 要一起設定

column6:
USB stable stable bit
0: not stable 
1: stable (count by SIRC32K)

數SIRC32K clock cycle 次數
00: 4 cycle(125us) 
01: 6 cycle(187.5us)
10: 8 cycle(250us)
11: 10 cycle(312.5us)

Conner Select (Defaut: TT)
000: 預設(選用順序1)
001: 調高(+) (選用順序3)
010: 降低(-) (選用順序8)
011: 降低(-) (選用順序7)
100: 調高(+) (選用順序6)
101: 降低(-) (選用順序2)
110: 不變 (接近000) (選用順序4)
111: 調高(+) (選用順序5)

0:正常PLL out duty
1:高速112/128Mhz 進行補償

system PLL stable bit     
0: not stable 
1: stable  (count by SIRC32K)

數SIRC32K clock cycle 次數
00: 4 cycle(125us) 
01: 6 cycle(187.5us)
10: 8 cycle(250us)
11: 10 cycle(312.5us)

Select Frequency range
0000: 4M (預設,NTPT)
0001: 5M (預設,NTPT)
0010: 6M (預設,NTPT)
0011: 7~8M (預設,NTPT)
0100: 4M (調高(+), NLPL)
0101: 5M (調高(+), NLPL)
0110: 6M (調高(+), NLPL)
0111: 7~8M (調高(+), NLPL)
1000: 4M (降低(-), NHPH)
1001: 5M (降低(-), NHPH)
1010: 6M (降低(-), NHPH)
1011: 7~8M (降低(-), NHPH)

Conner Select (Defaut: TT) PLL輸出頻段微調
00: 預設
01: 調高(+)
10: 降低(-)
11: 禁用
